Posts.Content: Aug 31, 2012 02:16PM sharonb56 wrote: I got my results and it is bc, stage 2, grade 2 to 3 infiltrating ductal. I have my surgery next friday and they are doing a lumpectomy. I am scared but coping for now. They will also do a sentinel node biopsy at that time. My breast surgeon says that i will see oncologist about a week after surgery and he will outline my treatment from there. I will have radiation and maybe chemo. it is all happening so fast now. The surgery will be day surgery. Thank you for the support ladies, it means the world to me. Hugs to you all!
